body:
+1 same here

**Update:**

**Note 1:** The [precompiled](https://storage.googleapis.com/grpc-precompiled-binaries/node/grpc/v1.10.1/node-v64-linux-x64-glibc.tar.gz) binaries are inaccessible.

**Note 2:**
Workaround:
```sh
env CXXFLAGS="-Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wno-stringop-truncation -Wno-cast-function-type" npm install grpc@1.11.3
```

@vaurelios, your workdaround is working!

Thanks you!
Those precompiled binaries were inaccessible because gRPC 1.10 did not have precompiled binaries for Node 10. We have also published gRPC 1.11, which does have precompiled binaries for Node 10.
Please reopen and fix the unsound cast as well.

@murgatroid99 

Please note that both commands below result in same error:

```
npm install --save grpc@1.11.3
npm install --save grpc@1.12.3
```
```
node-pre-gyp ERR! Tried to download(403): https://storage.googleapis.com/grpc-precompiled-binaries/node/grpc/v1.10.1/node-v64-linux-x64-glibc.tar.gz 
node-pre-gyp ERR! Pre-built binaries not found for grpc@1.10.1 and node@10.4.1 (node-v64 ABI, glibc) (falling back to source compile with node-gyp) 
node-pre-gyp ERR! Pre-built binaries not installable for grpc@1.10.1 and node@10.4.1 (node-v64 ABI, glibc) (falling back to source compile with node-gyp) 
node-pre-gyp ERR! Hit error Connection closed while downloading tarball file
```

Yeah, it still tries do download the 1.10 version.

I have same issue. Can anyone help.
Please if u can.
Contact me with telegram @jsmart4young

Update: Just found that the issue only exists in node 10, which grpc does not support yet #294.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is an issue for me today.

Still having this issue on **Arch + node 11.0.0 + grpc ^1.11.3**.

Workaround allow to compile further, but stops to another error (**maybe not related**):

```
CXX(target) Release/obj.target/grpc/deps/grpc/src/core/ext/filters/client_channel/subchannel_index.o
  COPY Release/grpc_node.node
  COPY /home/vloz/projets/bbprototype/functions/node_modules/grpc/src/node/extension_binary/node-v67-linux-x64-glibc/grpc_node.node
  TOUCH Release/obj.target/action_after_build.stamp
make: Leaving directory '/home/vloz/projets/bbprototype/functions/node_modules/grpc/build'

../deps/grpc/src/core/ext/filters/client_channel/subchannel_index.cc:255:1: fatal error: opening dependency file ./Release/.deps/Release/obj.target/grpc/deps/grpc/src/core/ext/filters/client_channel/subchannel_index.o.d.raw: No such file or directory
 }
 ^
```

EDIT: Downgrading to node 8.12 solved everything.
Why is this closed? I experience same issue like OP

First, this is a fairly old issue. Second, the node repository moved over to https://github.com/grpc/grpc-node. Third, the original issue was fixed. Any other problem you can see will be a different one, unrelated to the original issue. If you have problems installing grpc-node, please open new github issues in the [correct repository](https://github.com/grpc/grpc-node/issues/new?template=bug_report.md) using the issue template so we can help you with your specific problem.
